title: Tim Roten
content:
Hi friends

Please help me di the font use for the logo Tim Roten Homes

Thanks in advance

Miguel

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417144009im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jpglogo_4015.JPG)
author: hernando

comments.content: I Thought TIM ROTEN might be [Blazing](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417144009/http:/www.fontcubes.com/Blazing.font) close but not exact.

Samster Script, Sarah Script, Sofia Script & Stanford Script - all from Letterhead Fonts are all in the same ballpark if no one comes up with actual font.

[www.letterheadfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417144009/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/ "www.letterheadfonts.com")

JH

Tim Roten script is [Rapier](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417144009/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/rapier/) from Letraset.

- Mike Yanega
